input_args.passage: "David Wells' perfect game | On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history."
input_args.claim: "The team that he was pitching against is not mentioned in these sources, but the context of the question implies that it was Paul Molitor's team, so we can infer that David Wells had a perfect game against The Ignitor's team in 1998."
